00058 /* freetype2 handle ONLY for this file!. */
00059 static FT_Library ft_lib;
00060 
00061 int blf_font_init(void)
00062 {
00063     return FT_Init_FreeType(&ft_lib);
00064 }
00065 
00066 void blf_font_exit(void)
00067 {
00068     FT_Done_FreeType(ft_lib);
00069 }

00071 void blf_font_size(FontBLF *font, int size, int dpi)
00072 {
00073     GlyphCacheBLF *gc;
00074     FT_Error err;
00075 
00076     err = FT_Set_Char_Size(font->face, 0, (size * 64), dpi, dpi);
00077     if (err) {
00078         /* FIXME: here we can go through the fixed size and choice a close one */
00079         printf("The current font don't support the size, %d and dpi, %d\n", size, dpi);
00080         return;
00081     }
00082 
00083     font->size = size;
00084     font->dpi = dpi;
00085 
00086     gc = blf_glyph_cache_find(font, size, dpi);
00087     if (gc)
00088         font->glyph_cache = gc;
00089     else {
00090         gc = blf_glyph_cache_new(font);
00091         if (gc)
00092             font->glyph_cache = gc;
00093         else
00094             font->glyph_cache = NULL;
00095     }
00096 }
00097 
00098 static void blf_font_ensure_ascii_table(FontBLF *font)
00099 {
00100     GlyphBLF **glyph_ascii_table = font->glyph_cache->glyph_ascii_table;
00101 
00102     /* build ascii on demand */
00103     if (glyph_ascii_table['0'] == NULL) {
00104         GlyphBLF *g;
00105         unsigned int i;
00106         for (i = 0; i<256; i++) {
00107             g = blf_glyph_search(font->glyph_cache, i);
00108             if (!g) {
00109                 FT_UInt glyph_index = FT_Get_Char_Index(font->face, i);
00110                 g = blf_glyph_add(font, glyph_index, i);
00111             }
00112             glyph_ascii_table[i] = g;
00113         }
00114     }
00115 }
00116 
00117 /* Fast path for runs of ASCII characters. Given that common UTF-8
00118  * input will consist of an overwhelming majority of ASCII
00119  * characters.
00120  */
00121 
00122 /* Note,
00123  * blf_font_ensure_ascii_table(font); must be called before this macro */
00124 
00125 #define BLF_UTF8_NEXT_FAST(_font, _g, _str, _i, _c, _glyph_ascii_table)          \
00126     if (((_c) = (_str)[_i]) < 0x80) {                                            \
00127         _g = (_glyph_ascii_table)[_c];                                           \
00128         _i++;                                                                    \
00129     }                                                                            \
00130     else if ((_c = BLI_str_utf8_as_unicode_step(_str, &(_i))) != BLI_UTF8_ERR) { \
00131         if ((_g = blf_glyph_search((_font)->glyph_cache, _c)) == NULL) {         \
00132             _g = blf_glyph_add(_font,                                            \
00133                               FT_Get_Char_Index((_font)->face, _c), _c);         \
00134         }                                                                        \
00135     }                                                                            \
00136 
00137 
00138 #define BLF_KERNING_VARS(_font, _has_kerning, _kern_mode)                        \
00139     const short _has_kerning = FT_HAS_KERNING((_font)->face);                    \
00140     const FT_UInt _kern_mode = (_has_kerning == 0) ? 0 :                         \
00141                              (((_font)->flags & BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT) ?           \
00142                               ft_kerning_default : FT_KERNING_UNFITTED)          \
00143 
00144 
00145 #define BLF_KERNING_STEP(_font, _kern_mode, _g_prev, _g, _delta, _pen_x)         \
00146 {                                                                                \
00147     if (_g_prev) {                                                               \
00148         _delta.x = _delta.y = 0;                                                 \
00149         if (FT_Get_Kerning((_font)->face,                                        \
00150                            (_g_prev)->idx,                                       \
00151                            (_g)->idx,                                            \
00152                            _kern_mode,                                           \
00153                            &(_delta)) == 0)                                      \
00154         {                                                                        \
00155             _pen_x += delta.x >> 6;                                              \
00156         }                                                                        \
00157     }                                                                            \
00158 }                                                                                \
00159 
00160 void blf_font_draw(FontBLF *font, const char *str, unsigned int len)
00161 {
00162     unsigned int c;
00163     GlyphBLF *g, *g_prev = NULL;
00164     FT_Vector delta;
00165     int pen_x = 0, pen_y = 0;
00166     size_t i = 0;
00167     GlyphBLF **glyph_ascii_table = font->glyph_cache->glyph_ascii_table;
00168 
00169     BLF_KERNING_VARS(font, has_kerning, kern_mode);
00170 
00171     blf_font_ensure_ascii_table(font);
00172 
00173     while (str[i] && i < len) {
00174         BLF_UTF8_NEXT_FAST(font, g, str, i, c, glyph_ascii_table);
00175 
00176         if (c == BLI_UTF8_ERR)
00177             break;
00178         if (g == NULL)
00179             continue;
00180         if (has_kerning)
00181             BLF_KERNING_STEP(font, kern_mode, g_prev, g, delta, pen_x);
00182 
00183         /* do not return this loop if clipped, we want every character tested */
00184         blf_glyph_render(font, g, (float)pen_x, (float)pen_y);
00185 
00186         pen_x += g->advance;
00187         g_prev = g;
00188     }
00189 }
00190 
00191 /* faster version of blf_font_draw, ascii only for view dimensions */
00192 void blf_font_draw_ascii(FontBLF *font, const char *str, unsigned int len)
00193 {
00194     unsigned char c;
00195     GlyphBLF *g, *g_prev = NULL;
00196     FT_Vector delta;
00197     int pen_x = 0, pen_y = 0;
00198     GlyphBLF **glyph_ascii_table = font->glyph_cache->glyph_ascii_table;
00199 
00200     BLF_KERNING_VARS(font, has_kerning, kern_mode);
00201 
00202     blf_font_ensure_ascii_table(font);
00203 
00204     while ((c = *(str++)) && len--) {
00205         if ((g = glyph_ascii_table[c]) == NULL)
00206             continue;
00207         if (has_kerning)
00208             BLF_KERNING_STEP(font, kern_mode, g_prev, g, delta, pen_x);
00209 
00210         /* do not return this loop if clipped, we want every character tested */
00211         blf_glyph_render(font, g, (float)pen_x, (float)pen_y);
00212 
00213         pen_x += g->advance;
00214         g_prev = g;
00215     }
00216 }
00217 
00218 /* Sanity checks are done by BLF_draw_buffer() */
00219 void blf_font_buffer(FontBLF *font, const char *str)
00220 {
00221     unsigned int c;
00222     GlyphBLF *g, *g_prev = NULL;
00223     FT_Vector delta;
00224     int pen_x = (int)font->pos[0], pen_y = 0;
00225     size_t i = 0;
00226     GlyphBLF **glyph_ascii_table = font->glyph_cache->glyph_ascii_table;
00227 
00228     /* buffer specific vars*/
00229     const unsigned char b_col_char[4] = {font->b_col[0] * 255,
00230                                          font->b_col[1] * 255,
00231                                          font->b_col[2] * 255,
00232                                          font->b_col[3] * 255};
00233     unsigned char *cbuf;
00234     int chx, chy;
00235     int y, x;
00236     float a, *fbuf;
00237 
00238     BLF_KERNING_VARS(font, has_kerning, kern_mode);
00239 
00240     blf_font_ensure_ascii_table(font);
00241 
00242     while (str[i]) {
00243         BLF_UTF8_NEXT_FAST(font, g, str, i, c, glyph_ascii_table);
00244 
00245         if (c == BLI_UTF8_ERR)
00246             break;
00247         if (g == NULL)
00248             continue;
00249         if (has_kerning)
00250             BLF_KERNING_STEP(font, kern_mode, g_prev, g, delta, pen_x);
00251 
00252         chx = pen_x + ((int)g->pos_x);
00253         chy = (int)font->pos[1] + g->height;
00254 
00255         if (g->pitch < 0) {
00256             pen_y = (int)font->pos[1] + (g->height - (int)g->pos_y);
00257         }
00258         else {
00259             pen_y = (int)font->pos[1] - (g->height - (int)g->pos_y);
00260         }
00261 
00262         if ((chx + g->width) >= 0 && chx < font->bw && (pen_y + g->height) >= 0 && pen_y < font->bh) {
00263             /* don't draw beyond the buffer bounds */
00264             int width_clip = g->width;
00265             int height_clip = g->height;
00266             int yb_start = g->pitch < 0 ? 0 : g->height-1;
00267 
00268             if (width_clip + chx > font->bw)
00269                 width_clip -= chx + width_clip - font->bw;
00270             if (height_clip + pen_y > font->bh)
00271                 height_clip -= pen_y + height_clip - font->bh;
00272             
00273             /* drawing below the image? */
00274             if (pen_y < 0) {
00275                 yb_start += (g->pitch < 0) ? -pen_y : pen_y;
00276                 height_clip += pen_y;
00277                 pen_y = 0;
00278             }
00279 
00280             if (font->b_fbuf) {
00281                 int yb = yb_start;
00282                 for (y = ((chy >= 0) ? 0 : -chy); y < height_clip; y++) {
00283                     for (x = ((chx >= 0) ? 0 : -chx); x < width_clip; x++) {
00284                         a = *(g->bitmap + x + (yb * g->pitch)) / 255.0f;
00285 
00286                         if (a > 0.0f) {
00287                             float alphatest;
00288                             fbuf = font->b_fbuf + font->bch * ((chx + x) + ((pen_y + y)*font->bw));
00289                             if (a >= 1.0f) {
00290                                 fbuf[0] = font->b_col[0];
00291                                 fbuf[1] = font->b_col[1];
00292                                 fbuf[2] = font->b_col[2];
00293                                 fbuf[3] = (alphatest = (fbuf[3] + (font->b_col[3]))) < 1.0f ? alphatest : 1.0f;
00294                             }
00295                             else {
00296                                 fbuf[0] = (font->b_col[0]*a) + (fbuf[0] * (1-a));
00297                                 fbuf[1] = (font->b_col[1]*a) + (fbuf[1] * (1-a));
00298                                 fbuf[2] = (font->b_col[2]*a) + (fbuf[2] * (1-a));
00299                                 fbuf[3] = (alphatest = (fbuf[3] + (font->b_col[3]*a))) < 1.0f ? alphatest : 1.0f;
00300                             }
00301                         }
00302                     }
00303 
00304                     if (g->pitch < 0)
00305                         yb++;
00306                     else
00307                         yb--;
00308                 }
00309             }
00310 
00311             if (font->b_cbuf) {
00312                 int yb = yb_start;
00313                 for (y = 0; y < height_clip; y++) {
00314                     for (x = 0; x < width_clip; x++) {
00315                         a = *(g->bitmap + x + (yb * g->pitch)) / 255.0f;
00316 
00317                         if (a > 0.0f) {
00318                             int alphatest;
00319                             cbuf = font->b_cbuf + font->bch * ((chx + x) + ((pen_y + y)*font->bw));
00320                             if (a >= 1.0f) {
00321                                 cbuf[0] = b_col_char[0];
00322                                 cbuf[1] = b_col_char[1];
00323                                 cbuf[2] = b_col_char[2];
00324                                 cbuf[3] = (alphatest = ((int)cbuf[3] + (int)b_col_char[3])) < 255 ? alphatest : 255;
00325                             }
00326                             else {
00327                                 cbuf[0] = (b_col_char[0]*a) + (cbuf[0] * (1-a));
00328                                 cbuf[1] = (b_col_char[1]*a) + (cbuf[1] * (1-a));
00329                                 cbuf[2] = (b_col_char[2]*a) + (cbuf[2] * (1-a));
00330                                 cbuf[3] = (alphatest = ((int)cbuf[3] + (int)((font->b_col[3]*a)*255.0f))) <
00331                                           255 ? alphatest : 255;
00332                             }
00333                         }
00334                     }
00335 
00336                     if (g->pitch < 0)
00337                         yb++;
00338                     else
00339                         yb--;
00340                 }
00341             }
00342         }
00343 
00344         pen_x += g->advance;
00345         g_prev = g;
00346     }
00347 }
00348 
00349 void blf_font_boundbox(FontBLF *font, const char *str, rctf *box)
00350 {
00351     unsigned int c;
00352     GlyphBLF *g, *g_prev = NULL;
00353     FT_Vector delta;
00354     int pen_x = 0, pen_y = 0;
00355     size_t i = 0;
00356     GlyphBLF **glyph_ascii_table = font->glyph_cache->glyph_ascii_table;
00357 
00358     rctf gbox;
00359 
00360     BLF_KERNING_VARS(font, has_kerning, kern_mode);
00361 
00362     box->xmin = 32000.0f;
00363     box->xmax = -32000.0f;
00364     box->ymin = 32000.0f;
00365     box->ymax = -32000.0f;
00366 
00367     blf_font_ensure_ascii_table(font);
00368 
00369     while (str[i]) {
00370         BLF_UTF8_NEXT_FAST(font, g, str, i, c, glyph_ascii_table);
00371 
00372         if (c == BLI_UTF8_ERR)
00373             break;
00374         if (g == NULL)
00375             continue;
00376         if (has_kerning)
00377             BLF_KERNING_STEP(font, kern_mode, g_prev, g, delta, pen_x);
00378 
00379         gbox.xmin = pen_x;
00380         gbox.xmax = pen_x + g->advance;
00381         gbox.ymin = g->box.ymin + pen_y;
00382         gbox.ymax = g->box.ymax + pen_y;
00383 
00384         if (gbox.xmin < box->xmin) box->xmin = gbox.xmin;
00385         if (gbox.ymin < box->ymin) box->ymin = gbox.ymin;
00386 
00387         if (gbox.xmax > box->xmax) box->xmax = gbox.xmax;
00388         if (gbox.ymax > box->ymax) box->ymax = gbox.ymax;
00389 
00390         pen_x += g->advance;
00391         g_prev = g;
00392     }
00393 
00394     if (box->xmin > box->xmax) {
00395         box->xmin = 0.0f;
00396         box->ymin = 0.0f;
00397         box->xmax = 0.0f;
00398         box->ymax = 0.0f;
00399     }
00400 }
00401 
00402 void blf_font_width_and_height(FontBLF *font, const char *str, float *width, float *height)
00403 {
00404     float xa, ya;
00405     rctf box;
00406 
00407     if (font->flags & BLF_ASPECT) {
00408         xa = font->aspect[0];
00409         ya = font->aspect[1];
00410     }
00411     else {
00412         xa = 1.0f;
00413         ya = 1.0f;
00414     }
00415 
00416     blf_font_boundbox(font, str, &box);
00417     *width = ((box.xmax - box.xmin) * xa);
00418     *height = ((box.ymax - box.ymin) * ya);
00419 }
00420 
00421 float blf_font_width(FontBLF *font, const char *str)
00422 {
00423     float xa;
00424     rctf box;
00425 
00426     if (font->flags & BLF_ASPECT)
00427         xa = font->aspect[0];
00428     else
00429         xa = 1.0f;
00430 
00431     blf_font_boundbox(font, str, &box);
00432     return (box.xmax - box.xmin) * xa;
00433 }
00434 
00435 float blf_font_height(FontBLF *font, const char *str)
00436 {
00437     float ya;
00438     rctf box;
00439 
00440     if (font->flags & BLF_ASPECT)
00441         ya = font->aspect[1];
00442     else
00443         ya = 1.0f;
00444 
00445     blf_font_boundbox(font, str, &box);
00446     return (box.ymax - box.ymin) * ya;
00447 }
00448 
00449 float blf_font_fixed_width(FontBLF *font)
00450 {
00451     const unsigned int c = ' ';
00452     GlyphBLF *g = blf_glyph_search(font->glyph_cache, c);
00453     if (!g) {
00454         g = blf_glyph_add(font, FT_Get_Char_Index(font->face, c), c);
00455 
00456         /* if we don't find the glyph. */
00457         if (!g) {
00458             return 0.0f;
00459         }
00460     }
00461 
00462     return g->advance;
00463 }
00464 
00465 void blf_font_free(FontBLF *font)
00466 {
00467     GlyphCacheBLF *gc;
00468 
00469     font->glyph_cache = NULL;
00470     while (font->cache.first) {
00471         gc = font->cache.first;
00472         BLI_remlink(&font->cache, gc);
00473         blf_glyph_cache_free(gc);
00474     }
00475 
00476     FT_Done_Face(font->face);
00477     if (font->filename)
00478         MEM_freeN(font->filename);
00479     if (font->name)
00480         MEM_freeN(font->name);
00481     MEM_freeN(font);
00482 }
00483 
00484 static void blf_font_fill(FontBLF *font)
00485 {
00486     unsigned int i;
00487 
00488     font->aspect[0] = 1.0f;
00489     font->aspect[1] = 1.0f;
00490     font->aspect[2] = 1.0f;
00491     font->pos[0] = 0.0f;
00492     font->pos[1] = 0.0f;
00493     font->angle = 0.0f;
00494 
00495     for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
00496         font->m[i] = 0;
00497 
00498     font->clip_rec.xmin = 0.0f;
00499     font->clip_rec.xmax = 0.0f;
00500     font->clip_rec.ymin = 0.0f;
00501     font->clip_rec.ymax = 0.0f;
00502     font->flags = 0;
00503     font->dpi = 0;
00504     font->size = 0;
00505     font->cache.first = NULL;
00506     font->cache.last = NULL;
00507     font->glyph_cache = NULL;
00508     font->blur = 0;
00509     font->max_tex_size = -1;
00510     font->b_fbuf = NULL;
00511     font->b_cbuf = NULL;
00512     font->bw = 0;
00513     font->bh = 0;
00514     font->bch = 0;
00515     font->b_col[0] = 0;
00516     font->b_col[1] = 0;
00517     font->b_col[2] = 0;
00518     font->b_col[3] = 0;
00519     font->ft_lib = ft_lib;
00520 }
00521 
00522 FontBLF *blf_font_new(const char *name, const char *filename)
00523 {
00524     FontBLF *font;
00525     FT_Error err;
00526     char *mfile;
00527 
00528     font = (FontBLF *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(FontBLF), "blf_font_new");
00529     err = FT_New_Face(ft_lib, filename, 0, &font->face);
00530     if (err) {
00531         MEM_freeN(font);
00532         return NULL;
00533     }
00534 
00535     err = FT_Select_Charmap(font->face, ft_encoding_unicode);
00536     if (err) {
00537         printf("Can't set the unicode character map!\n");
00538         FT_Done_Face(font->face);
00539         MEM_freeN(font);
00540         return NULL;
00541     }
00542 
00543     mfile = blf_dir_metrics_search(filename);
00544     if (mfile) {
00545         err = FT_Attach_File(font->face, mfile);
00546         if (err) {
00547             fprintf(stderr, "FT_Attach_File failed to load '%s' with error %d\n", filename, (int)err);
00548         }
00549         MEM_freeN(mfile);
00550     }
00551 
00552     font->name = BLI_strdup(name);
00553     font->filename = BLI_strdup(filename);
00554     blf_font_fill(font);
00555     return font;
00556 }
00557 
00558 void blf_font_attach_from_mem(FontBLF *font, const unsigned char *mem, int mem_size)
00559 {
00560     FT_Open_Args open;
00561 
00562     open.flags = FT_OPEN_MEMORY;
00563     open.memory_base = (FT_Byte *)mem;
00564     open.memory_size = mem_size;
00565     FT_Attach_Stream(font->face, &open);
00566 }
00567 
00568 FontBLF *blf_font_new_from_mem(const char *name, unsigned char *mem, int mem_size)
00569 {
00570     FontBLF *font;
00571     FT_Error err;
00572 
00573     font = (FontBLF *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(FontBLF), "blf_font_new_from_mem");
00574     err = FT_New_Memory_Face(ft_lib, mem, mem_size, 0, &font->face);
00575     if (err) {
00576         MEM_freeN(font);
00577         return NULL;
00578     }
00579 
00580     err = FT_Select_Charmap(font->face, ft_encoding_unicode);
00581     if (err) {
00582         printf("Can't set the unicode character map!\n");
00583         FT_Done_Face(font->face);
00584         MEM_freeN(font);
00585         return NULL;
00586     }
00587 
00588     font->name = BLI_strdup(name);
00589     font->filename = NULL;
00590     blf_font_fill(font);
00591     return font;
00592 }
